responsibilities: Developed and maintained web-based HRIS and Procurement systems with integrated approval workflows.

Designed and implemented network topology to meet site requirements and ensure business continuity.

Administered and maintained FortiGate firewalls for network security, segmentation, and VPN configuration.
Configured and managed Active Directory, DHCP, and shared folders with proper access controls.
Handled hardware troubleshooting, network maintenance, and full IT asset management independently.
Provided 24/7 IT support to maintain uninterrupted operational activities.
Prepared technical documentation and reports for audit, compliance, and management purposes.
Developed and maintained an integrated web-based Broker Operation System to digitalize and streamline brokerage workflows.
Managed and maintained IT equipment, including hardware, software, and peripherals.
Configured and managed shared folders with role-based access controls to secure internal data sharing.
Administered corporate network infrastructure, ensuring stable connectivity and enforcing bandwidth management policies.
Configured and maintained Active Directory and DHCP services for centralized authentication and IP address management.
